snippet: The members of the Central Reserve Police Force were killed in an ambush in a forested area of the central state of Chhattisgarh.
abstract: Indian police officials say at least 13 members of Central Reserve Police Force were killed in ambush by Maoist militants in central state of Chhattisgarh, India.
lead_paragraph: The members of the Central Reserve Police Force were killed in an ambush in a forested area of the central state of Chhattisgarh.

headline.main: Maoist Rebels Kill 13 Members of a Police Force in India
headline.print_headline: India: Maoist Rebels Kill 13 Members of Police Force
